comments:
After isntalling the NLS package on my eclipse v2.01
(installed 2.0 upgraded to 2.01) the "Debug..." window
doesnt open anymore so I cant add (or select any prevous
made) debug configuration.

I'm using Sun SDK 1.4.1-beta on RedHat Linux 7.3

The stack trace is:
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 18

Does not appear to be a "debug" bug. Moving to SWT for investigation.

SSQ, did we fix some bugs in this area during 2.0.1.  I know we made a bunch of 
changes in HEAD but I'm pretty sure that these changes did not go in.  SSQ to 
investigate (quickly) to see where the "index out of range" could be.

Old code was wrong. It used the size of a MBCS buffer to create a
String. This has been fixed in latest (HEAD). The fix is not in
Eclipse 2.0.1.
